# Question 1

In the term one-way between persons study, what does "one-way" refer to? 

a. The number of DVs. 
b. The number of IVs. 
c. That persons participated at only one level of the IV. 
d. That persons participated at multiple levels of the IV. 


# Question 2

In the term one-way between persons study, what does "between persons" refer to? 

a. The number of DVs. 
b. The number of IVs. 
c. That persons participated at only one level of the IV. 
d. That persons participated at multiple levels of the IV.
